metadata.title: CVE-2014-4987 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: server_user_groups.php in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.2 and 4.2.x before4.2.6 allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended accessrestrictions and read the MySQL user list via a viewUsers request.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
